channel.title: Weird Server Crippling Error >.<
channel.description:
Well, I got The Following Error Not Everytime! But Some of the times when i Compile. Im not sure if this weird error is actually causing this problem im having, its letting me or anybody log onto the server once and only once and once they log out and try to log back in it will sorta log in, the screen playing area and mini map stay black and says loading please wait. Then if i ever want to get back on ill have to trash the files, and load my backup. So somebody please help me get to the root of this problem.
[URL=http://img523.imageshack.us/my.php?image=untitledvh6.png][IMG]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/2918/untitledvh6.th.png[/img][/URL]
[Click to Enlarge]
OR- This is what it says
[code]starting Soulscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 clienthandler: Accepted from Local Host :1121 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java. Lang.NullPointerException at Server.run<server.java:154> at java.lang.Thread.run.<Unknown Source> Error Download File.[/code]
[b]UPDATE[/b] This is whats at Server.Java @ and Around Line 154
[code]if (Found < 3) { misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);[/code]

item.title: Weird Server Crippling Error >.<
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

NullPointerException is thrown when an applet attempts to use null in a case where an object is required.

Read full topic
